features.featureTitle: Create a global API service module at frontend/src/services/api.ts that configures Axios with base URL http://127.0.0.1:8000. Export typed async functions for: postAnalyze(idea: string), postSimulate(analyzeData), postImage(idea: string), postReport(analyzeData), postLinkedIn(analyzeData), postAutopost(linkedinPost: string), and getMcpMetrics(). All functions must handle errors gracefully and return typed response data.

Create a global state management solution (React Context or Zustand store) in frontend/src/hooks/useCoFoundrStore.ts that persists: ideaText, analyzeResult, simulateResult, brochureImageUrl, reportBlob, linkedinPost, mcpMetrics, and per-step loading/error states. All workflow pages must read from and write to this shared state so results from /analyze are reused in subsequent steps without re-fetching.

Build a Landing Page at frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx featuring: a full-viewport 3D hero section with a Three.js / React Three Fiber animated particle or geometric background, the CoFoundrAI logo/brand name rendered in large gradient typography, a concise AI startup value-proposition tagline, and a prominent 'Analyze Your Idea' CTA button that navigates to the Dashboard page.

Build a persistent sidebar navigation component at frontend/src/components/Sidebar.tsx with links to: Dashboard, Simulation, Brochure, Report, LinkedIn, Auto-Post, and Metrics. Show the active route highlighted. Include the CoFoundrAI logo at the top. The sidebar collapses to an icon-only rail on smaller screens. Apply glassmorphism styling (frosted glass background, subtle border, backdrop blur).

Build a Workflow Progress Tracker component at frontend/src/components/WorkflowTracker.tsx that displays all 7 steps (Analyze, Simulate, Brochure, Report, LinkedIn, Auto-Post, Metrics) as a horizontal stepper or vertical timeline. Each step shows: idle, in-progress (animated spinner), completed (checkmark), or error (red indicator) states sourced from global state. Animate step transitions with smooth transitions.

Build the Dashboard page at frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx containing: a multiline textarea for startup idea input bound to global ideaText, an 'Analyze' button that calls POST /analyze and stores the result in global state, a full-page loading overlay with animated AI-themed spinner during the call, and an Agent Results Panel that displays the response fields: Business Analysis, Market Analysis, Tech Feasibility, Risk Analysis, and Validation Score — each in its own glassmorphism card with animated entrance.

Build a Simulation page at frontend/src/pages/SimulationPage.tsx. On page load (if analyzeResult exists), call POST /simulate with the analyzeResult payload. Display the response using Recharts or Chart.js charts: a line chart for market growth over time, a gauge or bar chart for success probability, and summary metric cards. Show a loading state during the call.

Build a Brochure page at frontend/src/pages/BrochurePage.tsx. Provide a 'Generate Brochure' button that calls POST /image with { idea: ideaText }. Display the returned image URL or base64 image dynamically in a styled preview card with a download link. Show a loading animation during generation.

Build a Report page at frontend/src/pages/ReportPage.tsx. Provide a 'Generate Report' button that calls POST /report with the analyzeResult. On success: show a Download PDF button that triggers browser file download of the returned binary, and a 'Preview' button that opens a modal displaying the PDF inline using an iframe or PDF viewer. Show loading and error states.

Build a LinkedIn page at frontend/src/pages/LinkedInPage.tsx. Provide a 'Generate Post' button that calls POST /linkedin with the analyzeResult and populates an editable textarea with the returned post text stored in global state. Below it, provide a 'Auto-Post to LinkedIn' button that calls POST /autopost with the current textarea content and shows a success toast notification on completion.

Build a Metrics page at frontend/src/pages/MetricsPage.tsx. On mount, call GET /mcp/metrics and display the response in a dashboard grid showing: Agent Executions count, System Performance indicators, and Request Counts — each in a styled stat card. Include a manual Refresh button. Auto-refresh every 30 seconds.

Build a global Toast notification system at frontend/src/components/ToastProvider.tsx. Expose a useToast hook for triggering success (green), error (red), and info (blue) toasts from anywhere in the app. Toasts must auto-dismiss after 4 seconds and support manual dismissal. Position them at the top-right corner.

Apply a cohesive premium dark SaaS visual theme across all pages and components: deep dark background (#0a0a0f base), frosted-glass cards (backdrop-blur + rgba fill + 1px border with subtle glow), gradient accent colors (cyan-to-violet), futuristic sans-serif typography, soft neumorphic shadows on interactive elements, and animated gradient lighting blobs in the background. Floating AI agent cards should have 3D depth on hover (CSS transform translateZ / perspective). Use smooth Framer Motion transitions for all page entrances, card appearances, and loading states.
